name: aws-toolkit-vscode
description: Amazon Web Services toolkit for browsing and updating cloud resources

enumDescriptions: Errors, Warnings, Info, Verbose, and Debug

view/item/context.when: view == aws.explorer && viewItem == awsLambdaNode || viewItem == awsRegionNode
view == aws.explorer && viewItem == awsLambdaNode || viewItem == awsRegionNode || viewItem == awsCloudFormationRootNode
view == aws.explorer && viewItem == awsLambdaNode || viewItem == awsRegionNode || viewItem == awsCloudFormationRootNode

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && editorLangId == asl || editorTextFocus && editorLangId == asl-yaml

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && webpack --mode production && npm run buildScripts -- --webpacked
scripts.reset: npm run clean -- node_modules && npm install
scripts.buildScripts: npm run generateNonCodeFiles && npm run copyFiles --
scripts.compile: npm run clean && webpack --mode development && npm run buildScripts -- --webpacked
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && tsc -watch -p ./
scripts.postinstall: ts-node ./scripts/build/generateServiceClient.ts && npm run generateTelemetry && npm run generateConfigurationAttributes
scripts.testCompile: tsc -p ./ && npm run buildScripts && npm run instrument
scripts.test: npm run testCompile && ts-node ./scripts/test/test.ts && npm run report
scripts.integrationTest: npm run testCompile && ts-node ./scripts/test/integrationTest.ts && npm run report
